Reviews.Title: HELP FOR SOUND!!!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Booth
Reviews.Content: It may accept two components, but for watching ONLY. Hooking up for sound is another story. In order to get sound on component #2, I have to disconnect the sound for component #1 and insert separate rca cables for component #2. AND, vice versa..Rather annoying is putting it mildly..The quality of the sound could also be improved..Otherwise, its ok for a bedroom, providing the victim is under 12..
